name: robot_attrition
title: Robot Attrition
author: Earendel
description: 机器人工作寿命是有限的,偶尔就会坏掉几台. 更高速的机器人意味着更多工作量,这就注定了他们损坏几率的提升. 机器人损坏并不会丢失物品. 只有物流机器人会损坏. 损坏几率可自由调整.
description_original: Robots do not fly perfectly forever. Very occasionally one will crash. Faster robots with more cargo are more likely to cause a crash. Carried items are not lost in a crash. Only logistic robots are affected. The crash rate is configurable.
